info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Litchfield and south central Berkshire Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandisfield, or 12 miles southeast of Great Barrington, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Norfolk, Sandisfield, Winsted, Colebrook, South Norfolk, Hitchcock Corners, Mooreville, Konkapot, North Colebrook, Riverton, New Boston, Kelly Corner, North Corners, Mill Brook, Robertsville, Southfield, Yelping Hill, Emmons Corners and Turkey Cobble. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
